meanings.definition: A type of head covering worn by clergy members.
meanings.sent1: The priest wore his birrettas during the church service.
meanings.sent2: The birrettas of the bishops were all different colors.
meanings.sent3: During the play, the actor mistakenly put on two birrettas at once, causing laughter in the audience.
meanings.sent4: The sea of colorful birrettas in the crowd made it look like a field of flowers.
meanings.sent5: The intricate designs on the birrettas made them stand out in the procession.

meanings.sent1: She bought three birrettas for the costume party.
meanings.sent2: The collection displayed various birrettas from different time periods.
meanings.sent3: The closet was overflowing with birrettas, making it hard to find anything else.
meanings.sent4: The birrettas on the shelf seemed to whisper stories of the past.
meanings.sent5: The room was filled with the vibrant colors of the birrettas hanging on the wall.
